Articles.Content: I have an early 2008 macbook with a trackpad/keyboard issue,any suggestions.?
I would suggest you describe the issue. Also, your thread has been moved to the off-topic lounge, since it is not about the game itself.

Agree, without a description of the problem it's tough to diagnose. But not knowing anything else I would say 1) remove and reinstall drivers; 2) take apart and clean it; 3) replace keyboard and trackpad components. If any of these fix it, you're goldenÃ¢â‚¬Â¦for a while, at least. It IS more than 7 years old
